name: Popular Posts
author: tosagor, aihimel

sections.description:
Popular post comes with some interactive features. Polularity tracking can be handle from both frontend and backend post page.

Popular Posts with tons of features and priority support.
Documentation See detail documentation here.
Get Express Support Open a support ticket to get support quickly.

Key Features

  • Popular Post : Arrange popular posts order by its hit popularity.
  • Awesome : Awesome UI layout to view populas posts.
  • Widget Support : Interactive widget option for plugin tuning.
  • Easy Installation : Easy Instalation for all kind of users.
  • Hit Counter : Post hit counter to show the total number of hits on that post.
  • Thumbnail View : Popular post summery in card view with thumbnail attachment.
  • Page Builder : Works fine with various page builder.

Requirements

  1. At least Firefox 12, Internet Explorer 9, Safari 6, Opera 12 or Chrome/Chromium 19
  2. PHP 5.2+ (for thumbnails – mogrify utility or GD/Imagick module)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Goto the any of the post and check the Custom Fields from Screen Options placed above.
  4. Tune your plugin in your way using GB Ppopular Post widget.
  5. Enjoy !
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

Will I support the plugin?

Yes, I will support the plugin.

short_description: WordPress comes with greate feature where popularity testing of posts is very essential need and Popular Posts can be a great tool to serve the want.
